TopicTitle: 2 vids from Zerolimitau. Orbital-strike on the Space Center!

Articles.Content:
:)Hey guys!

New to the forums but have spent many day and nights on Kerbal. Still having a blast!

Thought I would share two videos I've put together. Enjoy!

any comments or criticism appreciated.

Orbital-strike!

Kethane Intro video.

Was going to be the intro to my upcoming series.

Pretty awesome idea for the orbital strike. The only thing I could think of to make it more cool would be some MIRV warheads... something like a couple fuel tanks strapped on that you can jettison for a huge area of effect explosion as you get closer to the target.
Yea, i had a simillar thought! Was going to try and have it so tons of those strut brackets would fragment off before the hitting the target but I guess I forgot haha
